title: Todoist
longDescription: Todoist helps you organize your life and manage your work effortlessly. Add tasks, set priorities, and stay on top of deadlines with smart reminders. Collaborate on shared projects and track your progress visually. Sync across all devices so your plans are always with you. Focus on what matters most with a clean and simple interface built for productivity.

title: Evernote
longDescription: Evernote helps you capture ideas, tasks, and notes all in one place. Write text notes, scan documents, or clip web pages seamlessly. Organize your thoughts into notebooks and sync them across all devices. Powerful search makes it easy to find what you need in seconds. Stay organized, creative, and focused no matter where life takes you.

title: Google Keep
longDescription: Google Keep helps you capture ideas quickly with text, voice, or photo notes. Organize them with labels and colors to stay on track. Access your notes across all devices with automatic sync. Set reminders and collaborate easily with others. Keep your thoughts organized and ready whenever inspiration strikes.

title: Trello
description: Visual tool for managing projects and tasks.
longDescription: Trello turns your projects into organized boards that make collaboration easy and fun. Move tasks through lists to visualize progress and stay in control. Assign members, add due dates, and attach files for complete clarity. Perfect for teams and personal planning alike. Trello helps you stay flexible and productive every day.

title: Microsoft To Do
longDescription: Microsoft To Do helps you stay organized with smart task lists and daily reminders. Plan your day with My Day and track progress with simple checklists. Sync seamlessly across devices through your Microsoft account. Collaborate on shared lists with friends or colleagues. Make productivity simple, focused, and rewarding.

title: Slack
longDescription: Slack brings teams together through channels that organize conversations by project, topic, or team. Share files, make calls, and integrate with hundreds of tools easily. Stay connected whether you’re at your desk or on the go. With smart notifications and searchable history, no detail is ever lost. Slack helps work move faster and communication stay clear.

title: Google Drive
description: Cloud storage and file management service.
longDescription: Google Drive provides secure cloud storage for your files, photos, and documents. Access your data anytime from any device. Share and collaborate effortlessly with teammates or clients. With smart organization and AI-powered search, finding files is fast and easy. Your work is always safe, backed up, and within reach.

title: Google Calendar
longDescription: Google Calendar helps you stay on top of your schedule and plan your day efficiently. Create events, set reminders, and share calendars easily. Sync across all devices with your Google account. Get automatic event suggestions and smart scheduling assistance. Organize your life with clarity and never miss what’s important.

title: Asana
longDescription: Asana makes it easy to manage tasks, projects, and workflows across your team. Visualize progress with timelines, boards, and calendars. Automate routine work to save time and boost productivity. With built-in collaboration features, everyone stays aligned on priorities. Simplify teamwork and focus on what matters most.

title: Zoom
longDescription: Zoom helps you connect with others through high-quality video and audio meetings. Host webinars, virtual classrooms, or team calls with ease. Share your screen, chat, and collaborate in real time. Simple to use and trusted by millions of professionals worldwide. Wherever you work or study, Zoom keeps you connected.

title: Dropbox
description: Cloud storage and file sharing app.
longDescription: Dropbox makes it easy to back up, share, and access your files from anywhere. Work on projects with others and keep everything in sync. Share large files securely with a simple link. Protect your data with automatic backup and smart version history. Simplify your workflow and stay organized effortlessly.

title: Forest
longDescription: Forest helps you stay focused by planting virtual trees as you work. The longer you focus, the more your forest grows. Disconnect from distractions and build better habits. Earn rewards, unlock tree species, and track your progress. Stay mindful, motivated, and productive — one tree at a time.

title: Canva
description: Graphic design and content creation tool.
longDescription: Canva helps you design anything with ease — from presentations and posters to social media posts. Choose from thousands of templates and customize them instantly. Collaborate with your team in real time and export in any format. No design skills needed — just drag, drop, and create. Canva makes visual communication effortless and fun.

title: Grammarly Keyboard
longDescription: Grammarly helps you write with confidence wherever you type. It checks grammar, spelling, and clarity instantly. Get suggestions to improve tone, vocabulary, and readability. Whether writing emails, essays, or messages, Grammarly ensures your words make the right impact. Communicate clearly and professionally every time.

title: Clockify
longDescription: Clockify helps you track work hours across projects and tasks with ease. Start and stop timers to measure productivity accurately. Generate reports and analyze where your time goes. Ideal for freelancers and teams managing billable hours. Stay efficient, organized, and aware of your time like never before.

title: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, and projects.
longDescription: Notion is the ultimate workspace that lets you write, plan, and organize everything in one place. Combine notes, to-do lists, databases, and calendars effortlessly. Collaborate with your team in real time and stay productive anywhere. With flexible templates and powerful integrations, Notion adapts to your workflow. Turn ideas into action and make
